attributes.action: Keep Britannia on the 50 pence piece.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want Britannia kept on the 50 pence piece

government_responses.details:
The e-petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep Britannia on the 50 pence piece." is ongoing. 

This is a response in advance of the closing date from the Government and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14476.asp

Prime Minister's Office

You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep Britannia on the 50 pence piece."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18681


Prime Minister's Office
